sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Container, Button } from '../../globalStyles'; import { InfoSec, InfoRow, InfoColumn, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, ImgWrapper, Img } from './InfoSection.elements'; function InfoSection({ primary, lightBg, topLine, lightTopLine, lightText, lightTextDesc, headline, description, buttonLabel }) { return ( <> {topLine} {headline} {description} ); } export default InfoSection;
